meanings.definition: A headache affecting the entire head.
meanings.sent1: After a long day in the sun, she developed an epicrania that made her head throb.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with epicrania after she complained of head pain for days.
meanings.sent3: His epicrania was so intense that he couldn't even focus on his favorite TV show.
meanings.sent4: The epicrania felt like a heavy weight pressing down on her skull.
meanings.sent5: The epicrania was like a storm cloud looming over her head, ready to burst at any moment.
